subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen broke out of his shooting slump with 27 points and the Boston Celtics cruised past the host Charlotte Bobcats, 108-90, on Tuesday for their fifth straight victory.
snippet: Ray Allen broke out of his shooting slump with 27 points and the Boston Celtics cruised past the host Charlotte Bobcats, 108-90, on Tuesday for their fifth straight victory.
